title: Independent Tutor
description: Deliver personalized one-on-one instruction with primary focus on mathematics and computer science, while offering comprehensive academic support and organizational skill development.
responsibilities: Oversee full scope of independent business functions including appointment coordination, lesson planning, logistics management, and quarterly tax compliance
Partner with families and educators to evaluate academic challenges and create tailored learning strategies aligned with student goals
Design individualized lesson plans that foster active participation and drive measurable academic progress
achievements: Built strong relationships with parents, teachers, and students
Delivered personalized learning experiences across multiple subjects

title: Student Teacher
company: Denver Public Schools, Cherry Creek Public Schools, Jefferson County Public Schools
description: Completed student teaching placements across three school districts in the Denver metro area, collaborating with educators to analyze student performance data and deliver technical lessons.
responsibilities: Collaborated with educators, counselors, and administrators across three districts to design personalized pathways for student achievement
Developed and delivered 50+ technical lessons in mathematics
Translated complex mathematical concepts into accessible knowledge for diverse learners
Adapted teaching strategies to different school cultures and student populations
achievements: Successfully completed placements in three diverse school districts
Delivered 50+ comprehensive mathematics lessons across varied student demographics
Demonstrated adaptability across different educational environments
